definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Temperature is the main factor to influence the coal residue pyrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 熱解溫度是影響煤矸石熱解反應最主要的因素。

sentences.english: The environmental management of coal waste has become an impending problem.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石的環境治理問題已成當務之急。

sentences.english: Both coal gangue and coal bed methane are low heating value fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石和含甲烷量較低的煤層氣均屬於低熱值的燃料。

sentences.english: The foreground for the research on the resources utilizations of coal gangues is very great.
sentences.chinese: 變廢爲寶，開展煤矸石資源化利用研究前景廣闊。

sentences.english: The fact that coal mine refuse of Yongcheng is sandy mudstone was confirmed by XRD.
sentences.chinese: 經XRD證實永城煤矸石是砂質泥岩。

sentences.english: The kind of admixed coal gangue bas influence on the property of cement hydration.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石種類對水化性能有影響。

sentences.english: The test wipes off the iron using hydrochloric acid.
sentences.chinese: 利用鹽酸浸出煤矸石，以達到除鐵的目的。

sentences.english: At this stage they are called duns .
sentences.chinese: 在這個階段，我們稱之爲煤矸石。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
